 <body class="single single-post postid-2373 single-format-standard main" id="blog" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/WebPage">
  <div class="main-container-wrap">

     <article class="article ">
      <div id="content_box">
       <div class="post-2373 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-life tag-environment tag-forest tag-protecting-mother-earth tag-trees g has_thumb" id="post-2373">
        <div class="single_post">
         <header>
          <h1 class="title single-title">
           25 Photos That Show Why We Should Protect Our Forests. Number 18 Is Reason Enough
          </h1>
          <div class="post-info">
           <span class="thetime updated">
            <i class="icon-calendar">
            </i>
            June 7, 2014
           </span>
           <span class="thecategory">
            <i class="icon-tags">
            </i>
            <a href="http://www.likemuch.com/category/life/" rel="nofollow">
             Life
            </a>
           </span>
           <div>
            <div class="pw-widget pw-size-medium" pw:twitter-via="LikeMuch" style="float:right;margin-bottom: 15px;margin-top: -20px;">
             <a class="pw-button-facebook">
             </a>
             <a class="pw-button-twitter">
             </a>
             <a class="pw-button-googleplus">
             </a>
             <a class="pw-button-email">
             </a>
             <a class="pw-button-stumbleupon">
             </a>
            </div>
            <script src="http://i.po.st/static/v3/post-widget.js#publisherKey=sofc9s2ifmkauc88m9fk&amp;retina=true" type="text/javascript">
            </script>
            <style type="text/css">
             .pw-widget span {
      margin-right: 0px;
    }
            </style>
           </div>
          </div>
         </header>
         <!--.headline_area-->
         <div class="post-single-content box mark-links">
          <p>
           In this day and age when people are truly beginning to understand the consequences of not caring for our environment, the thrust to go green is slowly but surely gaining ground. While its good to reduce, reuse and recycle, another, there is still so much we can do, especially on a larger scale. Deforestation continues unabated especially in countries in the world where rules are lax and money can bend them.
          </p>
          <p>
           These photos of forests are not Photoshopped. They showcase our forests in all their amazing wonder and beauty. Hopefully, these stunning images will serve to inspire those who have the power to stop their destruction.
          </p>
          <p>
           1. A bed of blue in leaves of green.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest1.jpg">
            <img alt="forest1" class="alignnone wp-image-2374" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest1.jpg" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           2. No tricks here. Just the beautiful interplay of wildlife, sun and forest.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest2.jpg">
            <img alt="forest2" class="alignnone wp-image-2375" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest2.jpg" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           3. Although this image looks quite surreal, the reddish color is actually aluminum oxide. This industrial accident which killed ten people in Hungary should serve as a reminder for us to care for our environment.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest3.jpg">
            <img alt="forest3" class="alignnone wp-image-2376" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest3-1024x681.jpg" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           4. We are inconsequential against the power of the forest.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest4.jpg">
            <img alt="forest4" class="alignnone wp-image-2377" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest4.jpg" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           5. The forest takes over an abandoned railway.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest5.jpg">
            <img alt="forest5" class="alignnone wp-image-2378" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest5.jpg" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           6. Simply breathtaking
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest6.jpg">
            <img alt="forest6" class="alignnone wp-image-2379" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest6.jpg" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           7. Trees grow even in the most impossible of places.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest7.jpg">
            <img alt="forest7" class="alignnone wp-image-2380" height="600" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest7.jpg" width="500"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           8. The combination of water and trees never cease to amaze.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest8.jpg">
            <img alt="forest8" class="alignnone wp-image-2381" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest8.jpg" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           9. Gracefulness in full measure in the forest.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest9.jpg">
            <img alt="forest9" class="alignnone wp-image-2382" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest9.jpg" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           10. An invigorating walk under a bamboo forest.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest10.jpg">
            <img alt="forest10" class="alignnone wp-image-2383" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest10.jpg" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           11. The cure for the worlds deadliest diseases could be found here.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest11.jpg">
            <img alt="forest11" class="alignnone wp-image-2384" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest11.jpg" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           12. Gold waters frame this thick green jungle.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest13.jpg">
            <img alt="forest13" class="alignnone wp-image-2387" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest13.jpg" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           13. A walk in heaven? Almost.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest14.jpg">
            <img alt="forest14" class="alignnone wp-image-2388" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest14.jpg" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           14. How could people afford to cut these?
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest16.png">
            <img alt="forest16" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2390" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest16.png" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           15. Scene taken out from a fairy tale.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest15.jpg">
            <img alt="forest15" class="alignnone wp-image-2389" height="600" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest15.jpg" width="500"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           16. Magical.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest17.png">
            <img alt="forest17" class="alignnone wp-image-2391" height="500" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest17.png" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           17. Just golden.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest22.jpg">
            <img alt="forest22" class="alignnone wp-image-2393" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest22.jpg" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           18. If we dont protect our forests, there will be no more photos like this to take.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest18.png">
            <img alt="forest18" class="alignnone wp-image-2394" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest18.png" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           19. Winter wonderland.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest19.png">
            <img alt="forest19" class="alignnone wp-image-2395" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest19.png" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           20. The forest holds pleasant surprises in its midst.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest21.png">
            <img alt="forest21" class="alignnone wp-image-2396" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest21.png" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           21. It revitalizes the senses.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest23.png">
            <img alt="forest23" class="alignnone wp-image-2397" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest23.png" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           22. Dark but majestic.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest24.png">
            <img alt="forest24" class="alignnone wp-image-2398" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest24.png" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           23. The different shades of red, blue and green.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest25.jpg" style="line-height: 1.5em;">
            <img alt="forest25" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2400" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest25.jpg" width="550"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           24. We can only look up at how marvelous the forest has grown.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest26.jpg">
            <img alt="forest26" class="alignnone wp-image-2401" height="400" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest26.jpg" width="600"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           25. Forests dont only thrive on ground. They grow underwater as well.
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest27.jpg">
            <img alt="forest27" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-2402" height="413" src="http://likemuch.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/forest27.jpg" width="530"/>
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
